mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.dep_id AS "dep_id", a.yjk AS "yjk", a.jyk AS "jyk", a.fsk AS "fsk", a.csk AS "csk", a.xdtk AS "xdtk", a.xdgys AS "xdgys", a.sss AS "sss", a.tjremark AS "tjremark"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ironfo_department_yjb( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, dep_id, yjk, jyk, fsk, csk, xdtk, xdgys, sss, tjremark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{dep_id}, #{yjk}, #{jyk}, #{fsk}, #{csk}, #{xdtk}, #{xdgys}, #{sss}, #{tjremark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ironfo_department_yjb SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, dep_id = #{dep_id}, yjk = #{yjk}, jyk = #{jyk}, fsk = #{fsk}, csk = #{csk}, xdtk = #{xdtk}, xdgys = #{xdgys}, sss = #{sss}, tjremark = #{tjremark} WHERE id = #{id}
